data.title: Student and Public Employee IDs Approved for Voting
data.meta_description: The student identification cards and employee identification cards in the table below are approved for use as photo identification for voting statewide.
data.text:
The student identification cards and employee identification cards in the table below are approved for use as photo identification for voting through Dec. 31, 2024. All approved student and employee ID cards are acceptable statewide for voting.

Once the State Board approves an institution’s photo ID card, older photo IDs for that institution that are still in circulation are valid for voting, so long as the voter’s ID is valid and unexpired. A photo ID card that has no expiration date is not expired.
